attributes.action: Make Brexit a reality, we the people voted, not a dictatorship, its a democracy
attributes.additional_details: 51.4% voted to leave, over 17 million people voted to leave the EU in Brexit on 23.06.2016. People we need to unite like we have in the past! Let our voices be heard!
attributes.background: Right no one told us that that this could get overruled by court, we wasn't told it went to court till after the verdict, We voted look at what happened with Magna Carte when the parliament made us live a dictatorship, I thought we lived under democracy. You said Brexit meant Brexit, make it happen!
